response.overview: Johnny(Scott DeFalco) became a hardened soul when he witnessed his father's murder. Fifteen years later he still cannot shake the haunting memories that led him to a life of crime. His older brother Martin (Jonathan Aube) who never understood Johnny, became a respectable prosecutor with a lovely wife. The brothers make an attempt to reunite and that is when the trouble starts.
response.title: Unwelcome Strangers
